channel.title: 2020年度 on ZM Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2020年度 on ZM Blog

item.description: 资讯 JS现状调查 职位需求 如何评论浏览器最新的 WebAssembly 字节码技术? 优化策略 webpack打包优化 前端性能优化 样例笔记 Blender导出JSON格式教程threejs 基于G6的xmind 大文件上传&断点续传 HTML 5 Drag and Drop 入门教程 优秀的库/Demo midori：图像背景动画 Super Expressive：构建正则表达式 currency：处理货币 Vite：基于 Vue3 单文件组件的非打包开发服务器 jExcel：在线创建表格的轻量级插件 x-spreadsheet：在线电子表格 PDF-LIB：创建和修改PDF文档

资讯 Do all JavaScript tools lead to Rome? Rome的目标是取代Babel, ESLint, Webpack, Prettier, Jest等等 React 17.0 Release Candidate: No New Features but Still Lots That’s Interesting Quickly Find Front-End Issues Like JavaScript or Network Errors 前端监控解决方案。支持获取客户端报错信息、优化前端资源加载时间、UI页面测试（屏幕录制）。免费试用14天，但是数据存储地址只能选择美国/欧洲，且数据不能迁移。 TypeScript发布4.0 RC版本 npm v7 Now in Beta D3 6.0发布 Electron 10.0.0 Released 优化策略 从2.9秒到0.6秒，信息流首屏提效80%的秘诀 教程 Natively Format JavaScript Numbers：原生函数格式化数字，千分位、货币符号、单位等 🔧 优秀的库/Demo JS相关 Tabris.js：Tabris.js 3.6发布，支持Redux，PDF等。Tabris是一个移动应用开发框架，支持一套代码实现IOS、Android、Windows应用。该框架易上手的，调试、打包、发布一条龙。但控件可定制性不强，对UI/定制业务组件要求比较高的需求，实现起来较麻烦。 - 支持线上构建，安装开发者APP就能调试，无需其他环境配置 - 不需要webview - 支持npm包，以Node.js的方式引入模块 - 支持cordova插件（开发者app默认内置摄像头调用、扫码、陀螺仪、谷歌服务等cordova插件） - 支持fs，支持ES6、TypeScript和JSX，支持WebSocket等W3C API

资讯 深度解析 | Flutter web 支持的最新进展 Vue 3.0 ‘One Piece’ released Node.js September 2020 Security Releases Deno 1.4 Released MomentJS is done Feature Watch: ECMAScript 2021: Dr. Axel always keeps tabs on the new features coming to future versions of ECMAScript and he’s now started to do the same for the forthcoming ES2021. V8 Release 8.6: The latest version of the V8 JavaScript engine is now in beta until its eventual release with Chrome 86

资讯 webpack 5 Released Babel 7.12.0 Released with TypeScript 4.1 Beta Support and More React 17.0 Released npm 7.0 Released Node 14.13.0 has been released: with support for named exports for CommonJS modules. Node 15 Released: An upgrade to the V8 8.6 engine (from 8.4) adding various JS features like Promise.any(), logical assignment operators, and String.prototype.replaceAll() 教程，观点 Detached window memory leaks: Find and fix tricky memory leaks caused by detached windows.

资讯 Version 11 of Angular Now Available Babylon.js 4.2 Released: Powerful 3D Rendering Engine TypeScript 4.1 Released Chrome - What’s New In DevTools 教程，观点 WTFJS: A List of Funny and Tricky JavaScript Examples 10 Insights From Adopting TypeScript At Scale Operator Lookup: Enter a JavaScript operator to learn more about it Going from JavaScript to WebAssembly in three steps 聊一聊前端性能优化 CRP 速度提高几百倍，记一次数据结构在实际工作中的运用 postMessage 还能这样玩 🔧 优秀的库/Demo spacetime: 时区库 Socket.io 3.0 Released: A Realtime Framework for Node and Browser
